content: I'm looking for some new board game recommendations. I've been playing a lot lately, especially with my family and friends. Speaking of which, I played Scattergories with my cousins at a family gathering last weekend and had a blast - we had a really competitive game and I managed to win two rounds in a row! Do you have any suggestions for games that are similar to Scattergories or Ticket to Ride, which I introduced to my friend Emily recently?
